file_content.text: Just go, all right?
First we get cut off from Commander Gall, now Adan's dead... we're never getting off this planet alive. None of us.
How did you get cut off from your commander?
What happened to Gall?
Let me set things right.
Tell me how I can help.
This is war, kid. People die.
Buck up!
Shut up. If you knew the first thing about war, you would never have ignored those commandos. Adan paid for your mistake.
I just hope Commander Gall is still alive. If he is, you're the only one left who can save him.
When we recognized the leader of the Imperials we were following, Gall went after him--Lord Ondorru. The Sith who tricked us into bombing Fest.
How can you be sure it's the same Sith Lord?
Are you positive?
We're sure. We know everything about that piece of filth.
A Sith Lord, huh? That'll look good on my kill sheet.
Sounds like a fun challenge.
I hope you aren't all talk.
Nobody said anything about taking on a Sith Lord!
Sith? I'm leaving.
There may not be any choice. You have to save Commander Gall.
When Ondorru and the Imperials left, Gall took a few men and followed. But the Imperials collapsed the tunnel with remote charges right after our people went through.
Do you know where this tunnel lets out?
Where can I catch up to Gall?
Why can't anything be easy?
Always more problems.
You just took the easy way--it got my friend killed.
Gall should've known better than to charge off without backup.
That was pretty stupid.
You don't understand. Ondorru is the reason we're here--he ruined our lives! Gall couldn't let him get away!
The other end of the tunnel opens into the maximum security area. There's another way in, the main entrance... but it'll be tough.
The fighting around the main entrance is intense--but it's the only way left to reach Commander Gall.
I'll move out right away.
No time to lose.
Your CO is trapped with a Sith Lord. It may be too late already.
I'll do what I can.
Standing around talking doesn't help his chances.
If Gall can't keep himself out of trouble, why should I help?
This is ridiculous.
I'm not convinced you're even up to it. But if bringing us all back is your mission--that means Gall, too.
Just go.
I've taken on Sith before. No sweat.
Nothing to worry about.
I've had my fill of Sith. I'm not taking on another one.
Sith? I'm leaving.
Ondorru was with them! Lord Ondorru, the Sith we were trying to take out on Fest! He's here, now, on Belsavis!
How do you know it was Lord Ondorru?
Are you sure?
It was him. We all recognized him--after Fest, we memorized everything about him.
I've never taken down a Sith Lord before. Maybe now's my chance.
Sounds like a fun challenge.
Are you insane? You'd take on a Sith on foot?
I hope you aren't just bragging, or Commander Gall is in serious trouble.
I never agreed to take on a Sith Lord!
Sith? I'm leaving.
But you have to help him! You're the only one with any chance!
You've got to understand... Ondorru is the reason we're all here. Commander Gall couldn't let that filth escape.
When the Imperials started leaving, Gall took a handful of men and followed them. But there were remote charges in the tunnel--it collapsed just after our people moved through.
Can you tell me where this tunnel leads?
Where can I catch up?
The tunnel lets out in the maximum security area--or at least, it used to.
Nothing is easy on this planet.
Always more problems.
Gall is supposed to be a top-notch officer. What was he thinking?
That was a pretty stupid move.
Same thing as all of us--revenge. Justice for everyone in Dagger Wing, and for all of those civilians.
You'll have to find another way into the maximum security area--that's where this tunnel lets out.
The only other way in is the main entrance. There's a lot of fighting over there, but it's the only option left to reach Commander Gall.
I'll bring Gall back alive no matter what.
You can count on me.
If Gall is trapped with a Sith Lord, it may already be too late.
I'll do what I can.
Please--you have to try. He's been our leader since the beginning--we need him!
For military men, you people are worthless.
This is ridiculous.
We're pilots, not infantry. Put us in fighters, and we'd have Belsavis sorted out in an hour.
Good luck, soldier.
I've taken on Sith Lords before. No big deal.
Take it easy, pal.
You've taken down a Sith Lord? Whoa!
I've fought a Sith Lord before, and I'm not doing it again.
Sith? I'm leaving.
Adan! Adan! He's not breathing!
Stand back, I'll do what I can.
He... he's dead. I can't believe it.
Those were the commandos we saw on our way here--the ones you were supposed to take out! What happened?
The Imps shot your friend, not me!
It's not my fault!
Yeah, because you didn't take 'em out like you were supposed to!
I never thought something like this could happen.
I'm sorry.
Are you joking? You didn't think that elite Imperial commandos might track and ambush you if you didn't do anything to stop them?
I am a major in the Republic Special Forces. You do not question me.
Back off.
We don't have to answer to you!
I'm afraid the wounds were too severe. Your friend is dead.
I... I understand. Thank you for trying to help.
Look out!
They're here! Adan!
She's here, Adan!
Adan! He's here!
You're just in time. Commander Gall just rushed off after the Imps, you've got to help him!
You have to hurry. Commander Gall--he rushed off after the Imperials, he--argh!
Sniper! Everyone take cover! Return fire!
